title: Kenneth Cole Mineral Gunmetal Bedding Collection at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Outfit your bedroom in soft, cozy luxury with the Mineral duvet cover by Kenneth Cole Reaction Home. This linen blend duvet cover has been stone washed for extra softness, and has a lived-in look that's both casual and stylish. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/kenneth-cole-reaction-home-mineral-linen-cotton-duvet-cover-in-gunmetal/211404?Keyword=mineral+gunmetal&view=list 
Outfit your bedroom in soft, cozy luxury with the Mineral duvet cover by Kenneth Cole Reaction Home. This linen blend duvet cover has been stone washed for extra softness, and has a lived-in look that's both casual and stylish. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: The mineral gunmetal duvet and bedding collection by Kenneth Cole reaction home was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. The first layer of the bed begins with a white sheet set featuring eyelash trim at the hem of the sheet and the pillow sham adding a relaxed comfortable feel. The euro shams add an ideal backdrop to the bed. They are 100 percent cotton in all over knit pattern. The layering coverlet is also 100 percent cotton in a waffle weave. The mineral gunmetal duvet and pillow shams are a linen cotton blend that has been stone washed to create a comfortable soft texture. The coordinating pillow shams are finished with the same cozy texture. The resulting bed is easy and relaxed. The decorative pillows accenting this bed suite are a square chunky rhythmic pillow in white, an oblong text pillow, and a rectangular 100 percent cotton pillow with textured fabric with raw edges in gunmetal. The pillows add the key fashion elements to complete this bed look. The mineral gunmetal duvet and bedding collection is part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection. It is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
